ComicInfo.Tags: Hilt,The Fly,Nita Van Sloan,Jackson,Ram Singh,The Spider
ComicInfo.Summary: The unthinkable has happened. Richard Wentworth has been arrested for the crimes of the Spider, while the unholy alliance between the Fly and the Lawgiver threatens to destroy New York's Police force. With the Spider on the run, and Commissioner Kirkpatrick abducted, the deadly endgame begins and there is no one to stop a deadly attack that will leave the city without government or law enforcement. Be prepared for a shocking conclusion!
